doc:
George K. Arthur https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_K._Arthur 0 George K. Arthur (27 January 1899 – 30 May 1985) was an English actor and producer. He appeared in 59 films between 1919 and 1935. He won an Academy Award for Best Short Film in 1956 for the film The Bespoke Overcoat.He was born in Littlehampton, Sussex and died in New York City. Some of his early success was in the late 1920s when partnered with Karl Dane as part of a comedic duo called 'Dane Arthur'. George_K._Arthur ( 27_January_1899 – 30_May_1985 ) was an_English_actor_and_producer . He appeared in 59_films between 1919_and_1935 . He won an_Academy_Award for Best_Short_Film in 1956 for the_film The_Bespoke_Overcoat.He was_born in Littlehampton , Sussex and died in New_York_City . Some of his_early_success was in the_late_1920s when partnered with Karl_Dane as part of a_comedic_duo called '_Dane_ ' .
